news.title: Google Rolling Out Desktop Search Redesign With Black “Ad” Label, Favicons for Organic Results
news.description: Google’s recent redesign of mobile search results (including a new black "Ad" label and favicons by the URLs) is now rolling out to desktop search results as well.

news.title: Google Handles Reconsideration Requests in Batches
news.description: Google confirms that it handles in batches requests for review of your site after you fix problems identified in a manual action or security issues notification.

news.title: YouTube’s Organic Visibility Tops Wikipedia in Google SERPs
news.description: YouTube recently overtook Wikipedia for the #1 spot in organic search, highlighting the importance of optimizing videos for search.

news.title: Google Ads Introduces Bid Simulator Support for Smart Bidding
news.description: Google Ads has announced it is rolling out support for a bid simulator, as well as a new budget simulator.
